channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [Global][Hosted private cloud] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 18
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Aug 4, 06:00 UTC  -  Aug 6, 15:00 UTC

Jun 22, 13:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 04/07/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 06/07/2022 15:00 UTC
Service impact : Up to three reboot and if we meet an issue during the reboot of the host, it will be replaced. (20 min)
Service improvement : All hosts are upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility.

If you are from wave 18 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Vms will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:
Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot.
If hosts are already on 19195723, they will be skipped

item.title: [Global][Hosted private cloud] - Maintenance upgrade host - wave 15
item.description:
Jun 16, 16:18 UTC
Completed - Start time : 13/06/2022 06:00 UTC
End time : 16/06/2022 15:00 UTC
Description : If you are from wave 15 you will receive a mail from us and you will be able to schedule again with the manager.
Builds will be pushed to the host, put in maintenance mode, all Virtual machines will be moved with Vmotion and last hosts will be rebooted .
If we meet an issue during the reboot of the host , it will be replaced. (20 min)

If major update have to be done, it will be two successive reboots like this:

Host v6.0 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.5 : upgrade major to v6.7, reboot, then upgrade minor to the last build v6.7, reboot.
Host v6.7 : upgrade minor to the last build 19195723 if needed, reboot.

If hosts are already on build 19195723, they will be skipped.
Service impact : None
Service improvement : All hosts have to be upgraded frequently due to the VMware's matrix of compatibility and also due to the CVE.

item.title: [RBX2][Hosted Private Cloud] - tete-2126
item.description:
Jun 5, 10:56 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 05/06/2022 08:44 UTC
End Time : 05/06/2022 10:44 UTC
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : All the impacted pcc on tete-2126 are operational again.
Root cause : A hardware failure was at the origin of this incident.

Jun 5, 09:04 UTC
Investigating - Start time: 05/06/2022 08:44 UTC
User impact : The following pcc on tete-2126 : pcc-004500, pcc-004468, pcc-004502, pcc-004501,pcc-004465 are currently unreachable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2A
Ongoing Actions: We are currently working on this issue.
